items.name: init(Code, userInfo: [String : Any])
items.desc: Initializes an error.

items.name: static func == (ARError, ARError) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether two errors are equal.

items.name: static func != (ARError, ARError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values aren't equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of a value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value.

items.name: var errorUserInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: The error user info dictionary.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: The user info dictionary.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A string that contains a description of the error.

items.name: static var errorDomain: String
items.desc: A string that indicates the error domain in Core Foundation.

items.name: var errorCode: Int
items.desc: An integer value for an error.

items.name: var code: Code
items.desc: A code that indicates the cause of the error.

items.name: enum ARError.Code
items.desc: Codes that identify errors in ARKit.

items.name: static var requestFailed: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error the framework produces when a request fails.

items.name: static var cameraUnauthorized: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the app lacks user permission for the camera.

items.name: static var fileIOFailed: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error the framework produces when file access fails to read or write.

items.name: static var insufficientFeatures: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework requires more features to complete a task.

items.name: static var invalidCollaborationData: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that results when the framework fails to parse collaboration data the app receives over the network.

items.name: static var invalidConfiguration: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the configuration contains ambiguous or erroneous data.

items.name: static var invalidReferenceImage: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to process a reference image.

items.name: static var invalidReferenceObject: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to process a reference object.

items.name: static var invalidWorldMap: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to process a world map.

items.name: static var microphoneUnauthorized: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the app lacks user permission for the microphone.

items.name: static var objectMergeFailed: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to merge a detected object.

items.name: static var sensorFailed: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates a sensor failed to provide required input.

items.name: static var sensorUnavailable: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to access a required sensor.

items.name: static var unsupportedConfiguration: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the device doesn’t support the session's configuration.

items.name: static var worldTrackingFailed: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error the framework produces when world tracking experiences an unrecoverable problem.

items.name: static var geoTrackingFailed: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to match localization imagery with the device’s camera captures.

items.name: static var geoTrackingNotAvailableAtLocation: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error the framework produces when a location lacks geotracking support.

items.name: static var locationUnauthorized: ARError.Code
items.desc: An error that indicates the app lacks user permission for the device's current location.
